鉷字的基本解释

鉷
hóng
弩上供钩弦发箭的部件。

鉷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hóng］
［《廣韻》户公切，平東，匣。］
(1)弓弩上射箭的装置。
(2)作人名用字。唐有王鉷。见《旧唐书》本传。

鉷字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鉷； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1303第15
【廣韻】戸公切【集韻】【正韻】胡公切，?音洪。【玉篇】弩牙。　又人名。【正韻】唐有王鉷。

鉷字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鉷字的起名意思

弓弩上射箭的装置。

Grebe
Basic explanation of words
Grebe
hóng
The part of a crossbow for hooking and shooting arrows.
Grebe
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hóng］
["Guangyun" Hu Gongqie, Pingdong, Xie. ]
(1) A device for shooting arrows on a crossbow.
(2) Use words for names. There are king grebes in the Tang Dynasty. See the biography of "Old Tang Book".

[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鉷; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 1303 15
[Guang Yun] Gong Gong cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Hu Gong cut,? Yin Hong. [Jade articles] Crossbow teeth.　Another name. [Positive rhyme] There is a king grebe in the Tang Dynasty.
